org.onehippo.forge.content.pojo.common

Class BasePathBasedContentNodeItemFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.onehippo.forge.content.pojo.common.BasePathBasedContentNodeItemFilter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultContentNodeJcrBindingItemFilter, DefaultJcrItemMappingFilter

    public class BasePathBasedContentNodeItemFilter
extends Object
    Base class implementation providing filtering on ContentItem objects, based on property type, property path, node path, with include/exclude patterns.
